data.eml:eml: Review of the waspfish genus Liocranium (Scorpaeniformes: Tetrarogidae), with restoration of L. pleurostigma (Weber)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Motomura, Hiroyuki, Last, Peter R., Johnson, Jeffrey W. (2008): Review of the waspfish genus Liocranium (Scorpaeniformes: Tetrarogidae), with restoration of L. pleurostigma (Weber). Zootaxa 1820: 27-40, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.182991
